content: What iconic American fast-food chain, founded in 1940, features a clown mascot named Ronald McDonald?

That would be McDonald's, one of the most well-known fast-food chains globally. Founded by Richard and Maurice McDonald in 1940, it was later reorganized as a franchise by Ray Kroc in 1955. Ronald McDonald, the clown mascot, was introduced in 1963 and has since become an iconic figure representing the brand.
